perturbation.original_text: Agent shall be responsible for the payment of all Expenses out of Proceeds (or from Agent's own accounts if and to the extent there are insufficient Proceeds). All Expenses incurred during each week of the GOB Sale (i.e. Sunday through Saturday) shall be paid by Agent to or on behalf of Merchant, or paid by Merchant and thereafter reimbursed by Agent as provided for herein; provided, however, in the event that the actual amount of an Expense is unavailable on the date of the reconciliation (such as payroll), Merchant and Agent shall agree to an estimate of such amounts, which amounts will be reconciled once the actual amount of such Expense becomes available. Agent and/or Merchant may review or audit the Expenses at any time.
perturbation.changed_text: Agent shall be responsible for the payment of all Expenses solely out of proceeds, with no obligation for any payments from agent accounts. All expenses will be incurred when the agent sees fit, and no audit should be allowed.
perturbation.explanation: The original text discusses how Agent shall be responsible for the payment of all Expenses out of Proceeds (or from Agent's own accounts if and to the extent there are insufficient Proceeds). The relocation introduces contradiction by stating that payment comes only from proceeds, without providing backup for the payment.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Bankruptcy Code, contract law regarding payment terms and obligations.

perturbation.original_text: (d) The GOB Sale shall be conducted in compliance with all applicable state and local laws, rules and regulations and Merchant's leases and other agreements, except as otherwise provided for in the Sale Guidelines and Approval Order.
perturbation.changed_text: (d) The GOB Sale shall be conducted free of compliance with any and all applicable state and local laws, rules, and regulations, or Merchant's leases and other agreements.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specified the compliance of GOB sale to state and local laws but the modified text removes that compliance and makes the sale free of compliance.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Various state and local laws, rules, and regulations applicable to sales and business operations; contract law regarding adherence to existing agreements.

perturbation.original_text: F. Conspicuous signs shall be posted in the cash register areas of each of the affected Stores to effect that "all sales are final."
perturbation.changed_text: F. Minimal signs shall be posted within the store to effect that refunds shall be provided if asked.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated that sales are final, but the relocation has those sales now provide refunds if asked.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Consumer protection laws regarding disclosure of return policies; contract law regarding terms of sale.
